dcterms:description: The WMT-13 ranks corpus is a by-product of the manual systems evaluation carried out in the WMT-13 evaluation, where annotators rank translations from best to worst based on similarity to reference translations.
dcterms:title: WMT-13

dcterms:creator: Matouˇs Mach´acek

dcterms:description: WMT-14 is a dataset used for evaluating machine translation metrics, providing results from the WMT-14 metrics shared task.
dcterms:title: WMT-14

dcterms:description: SICK is a dataset developed for evaluating semantic similarity, containing sentence pairs annotated for their semantic relatedness.
dcterms:title: SICK
